creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Workaround required for build error in build.sh(tomcat-jakarta-3.2.1-src)


BUILD FAILED

/usr/local/jakarta/jakarta-tomcat/build.xml:94: Cannot use classic compiler, as it is not available

I am not sure what is this classic compiler(is it a java compiler?)

Use -Dbuild.compiler=modern in ant command line
Fixed in 3.3
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Applied change to Tomcat 3.2.2 as well.
For query purposes mark as fixed in Tomcat 3.2.2 and Tomcat 3.3
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
